column1: New from me in @Jezebel: “The lesson from COVID-19 is not that moms aren’t doing enough to juggle. Instead it is that even during this national emergency moms are being asked to bear more than their share.”  Read more 👇👇 https://t.co/V3Ct1qDI34

There’s been talk about meeting halfway in negotiations but there’s nothing to meet when the Senate hasn’t passed an alternative COVID relief bill and the President is busy tweeting temper tantrums.  Working families need help but the Senate and the President won’t do the work. https://t.co/9gOfvdnsoK

I’m wishing a happy birthday to our governor @GavinNewsom! He’s been a key partner as I fight in Washington to put California families first and I’m thankful for his leadership as our state navigates the COVID-19 pandemic and record-breaking wildfires. https://t.co/SxfFDPQ3cH

The President’s flip flop on COVID relief shows that he’s more interested playing politics than helping people. But Orange County families regardless of party know that our state and local governments need federal support to pay our teachers and first responders. https://t.co/r0TIxB64km

Coronavirus treatment and a potential vaccine should not be limited to the wealthy and the well-connected. This plan will save lives and protect Americans regardless of insurance status. https://t.co/KOO9qySATh

Getting a flu shot is a quick and easy way to keep you safe during flu season. This fall especially it's crucial to help our doctors and hospitals stay focused on the fight against COVID-19. Don't skip your flu shot this year!
Over 1000 people in Orange County have lost their lives to COVID-19. Their loved ones will feel that loss even if the President doesn’t. https://t.co/6ZtefetuRe
The coronavirus pandemic didn’t create these gaps in our healthcare system but it did bring them into sharp clarity. Say it with me: healthcare is a human right. https://t.co/JWiAZBeQ7O

As COVID-19 cases increase we can't still be arguing about who foots the bill for testing. I secured a commitment from a top Trump official that they would make testing free. It's way past time to fulfill that promise. https://t.co/td4SKnvGbl

I secured a commitment for free COVID-19 testing months ago. Then Congress passed additional legislation that would require this. Yet patients are still receiving bills.  I won't let this go: the Administration needs to keep its promise and implement the law more forcefully. https://t.co/MFaQUEXodA

Simply put: the Trump Administration has dragged their feet on delivering relief to workers harmed by the coronavirus—and they're still prioritizing corporations over people. @ewarren and I are demanding they do better. https://t.co/xlKz0eYDjK

The FDA’s ban on gay and bisexual men donating blood is a discriminatory policy without scientific grounding. It could also undermine medical research as we race to find treatments for COVID-19. I’m pushing against this outdated policy.  https://t.co/2CHrVY83BA

I know that the coronavirus pandemic is challenging for our faith communities. I hope that all those observing #Ramadan in Orange County and across the country are nonetheless able to find strength and peace. Ramadan Mubarak!

I’m thinking of my dear friend @ewarren today who lost her brother to COVID-19. This pandemic has cost thousands of Americans their lives leaving friends and loved ones behind. To all those who have experienced loss: I see your pain and I’m with you. https://t.co/3zYZjxRMAe

I’ve never taken corporate PAC money and today I announced I’m taking it a step further by refusing donations from lobbyists.  We’ve seen Washington insiders try to get corporations special treatment in coronavirus relief legislation.  You deserve to know Congress works for you.
I am proud of Californians for the work that we’ve done to social distance and flatten the curve. It’s working but we must keep it up. #StayHomeSaveLives https://t.co/jN8mK4LGn7

Update: I tested negative for COVID-19 which is a relief. I’m continuing to recover at home and hope to be back to 100% soon. Thank you to everyone who sent messages of support—they are great fuel for fighting off this illness!

Truth: #KatiePortersWhiteboard runs in the family (my parents were both teachers). Here’s my sister @dremilyportermd an emergency physician explaining “flattening the curve” for COVID-19. Watch to learn more about how you can save lives ➡️ https://t.co/7cTpQzjWWf
Battling COVID-19 requires us to be creative AND consistent with public health guidance. What other ideas for social distancing should we add to #KatiePortersWhiteboard to help protect our community?

Current CDC guidance recommends staying 6 to 10 feet away from each other. This social distancing can dramatically reduce and slow the transmission of COVID-19. How you social distance will depend on your circumstances.

Just before 1AM this morning I joined my House colleagues to pass the #FamiliesFirst Act which would deliver life-saving emergency resources for #COVID_19 to working Americans. The Senate should pass this bill ASAP.  As I made clear to the CDC Director people need help NOW.
To be clear cost should not deter people with symptoms from getting tested. However if you’re feeling a-okay stay home and practice social distancing to mitigate the spread of coronavirus!
🚨🚨🚨 A top Trump official today committed to me that they would finally act and use existing law to make coronavirus testing free for all Americans. Get tested! https://t.co/9em7a2mXgv

Orange County has seen one confirmed case of novel coronavirus and while risk of infection to the public in Orange County is believed to be low here is what you need to know according to the California Department of Public Health ➡️ https://t.co/KdZfftZgWv
